serialNumberSearch.serialNumberHint: Serial numbers normally contain letters and numbers only
serialNumberSearch.searchResultsInfo: Select the manufactured home to download the full details of the home. Selecting the home will debit your search fee from your BC Online account. The downloaded report will contain the full record of the registration for the home and will be automatically saved to your dashboard.
serialNumberSearch.reviewSearchResultInfo: Review the details of the manufactured home before paying. Your search result will be available in your Searches list.
serialNumberSearch.searchHeader: Manufactured Home and Personal Property Registry Search

serialNumberValidation.serialNumberHint: Serial numbers normally contain letters and numbers only
serialNumberValidation.searchValueEmptyMessage: Enter a serial number to search
serialNumberValidation.specialCharacterMessage: Serial numbers don't normally contain special characters
